abilityEffect: Remove all Special Conditions from each of your [G] Pokémon. Each of your [G] Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

effect.en: If Venusaur already has 8 or more damage counters on it, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned, Confused, and Poisoned.
If the Defending Pokémon is affected by any Special Conditions, this attack does 40 damage plus 40 more damage for each of those Special Conditions.
